title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 November 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:06 <vmassol> good morning  
09:12 <Inge-> morning  
09:13 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <vmassol> reminder: last week before 7.4M1 release  
09:45 <vmassol> :)  
09:46 <vmassol> hope you had a nice weekend!  
09:46 <vmassol> (pretty cold here… freezing)  
09:49 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <cjd> Good Morning  
09:52 <cjd> I read it's going to warm up, this weather is a bit annoying  
09:52 <cjd> Oh I smelled the smell of wood stoves the other day, at least somebody is keeping warm  
09:54 <vmassol> next week yes  
09:54 <vmassol> (it's going to get warmer, above 10 degres)  
09:55 <cjd> I'm just glad I don't have to shovel snow  
09:57 <cjd> Maybe this aweful weather will finally push me over the edge and I will order fiber and bring home my non-porable electric heater disguised as a computer  
09:57 <cjd> \*portable  
10:07 <vmassol> Ramona1: good morning  
10:07 <Ramona1> hi  
10:07 <vmassol> I don't know if you have the time but someone reported that http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Scripting+Documentation+Application doesn't work on XWiki 7.3  
10:08 <vmassol> do you think you could test it?  
10:08 <vmassol> (making sure to clear your browser cache since it contains JS)  
10:08 <vmassol> see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/API?viewer=comments#xwikicomment\_2  
10:09 <Ramona1> i will test it today  
10:09 <vmassol> ok great, thanks!  
10:09 <Ramona1> np :)  
10:25 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <cjd> vmassol: I know you might not like the idea much but if we go ahead with an ElasticSearch/SOLR big-data store, we could actually make the sql database non-authoritative, that is to say if it is corrupted, we rebuild it from nosql.  
10:41 <cjd> This means embedded database is perfectly fine for production  
10:42 <vmassol> yes that's an idea but right now my goal wasn't to store the same data in both stores  
10:42 <vmassol> (would slow down perfs in general)  
10:43 <vmassol> thanks for your reply on the list  
10:43 <cjd> Oh I'm just happy to see the idea of a big data store being available :)  
10:43 <vmassol> saw that :)  
10:43 <vmassol> we already have 2 with SOLR + ES  
10:43 <cjd> note that we do duplicate data already, in the SOLR search store  
10:43 <vmassol> (search + ActiveInstalls)  
10:43 <vmassol> yep  
10:43 <cjd> yeah SOLR, RDBMS, FS Attach  
10:44 <vmassol> oh  
10:44 <cjd> it's getting a bit heavy  
10:44 <vmassol> you mean rebuild the RDBMS from the AS for ex?  
10:44 <cjd> right  
10:44 <vmassol> ok I see  
10:44 <vmassol> makes sense  
10:44 <vmassol> you'll just miss the initial state  
10:44 <vmassol> (initial content for each doc)  
10:44 <cjd> right, we'd need to have some magic to manage the switch  
10:45 <cjd> Also consider shoving off all of the doc history tables into nosql, this way the sql database only holds things you actually care to query on  
10:46 <vmassol> yes  
10:46 <vmassol> that's a good idea too  
10:46 <cjd> I'm not sure if it would work well for attachments but if it existed, the FSAttach infrastructure could be fairly easily reworked to store the data elsewhere  
10:47 <cjd> then we would actually have 1 place that is authoritative...  
10:47 <cjd> Fabio would love you forever when he had to setup clusters...  
10:50 <vmassol> :)  
10:51 <cjd> Oh I was musing the other day about whether user profile pages might become nested  
10:51 <cjd> this way someone could have their own scratch-space  
10:51 <cjd> even fork/merge workflow becomes possible  
10:52 <cjd> I suppose I should file that as an Idea ticket  
10:53 <tmortagne> [WARN] Restarting myxwiki.org on 7.3 in 15min  
10:57 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <msmeria> has quit  
11:02 <vmassol> cool tmortagne  
11:20 <tmortagne> [WARN] Restarting myxwiki.org on 7.3  
11:27 <tmortagne> going to take a while since it's migrating databases (a loooot of databases)  
11:35 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <vmassol> tmortagne: should advertise the maintenance on https://twitter.com/myxwiki prior to doing it no?  
11:38 <vmassol> hmm I see people do retweets with this account, weird...  
11:38 <tmortagne> when it's panned several days before sure but otherwise it's not very useful IMO  
11:38 <vmassol> well right now if I were using myxwiki.org I wouldn't know why it's not working  
11:38 <vmassol> (as a user)  
11:40 <tmortagne> vmassol: as a user you can see your wiki right now  
11:40 <tmortagne> migration is done and DW is running currentlty  
11:49 <tmortagne> [ANN] myxwiki.org is now on 7.3, all seems ok  
11:51 <vmassol> thx!  
11:52 <vmassol> don't forget to announce it on https://twitter.com/myxwiki :)  
11:53 <Ramona1> vmassol: i managed to reproduce the problem  
11:53 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's part of the upgrade process  
11:54 <Ramona1> There are indeed HTML errors  
11:54 <vmassol> could you please report an issue?  
11:54 <Ramona1> sure  
11:54 <vmassol> thanks  
11:54 <vmassol> it probably means we have a regression somewhere so that's pretty important  
12:02 <tmortagne> Ramona1: a copy of the errors in the issue would be nice too :)  
12:03 <Ramona1> i will add them in one minute :)  
12:03 <tmortagne> cool  
12:03 <Ramona1> i am still working on the steps to reproduce :)  
12:06 <tmortagne> hmm I forgot that solr needed an upgrade  
12:09 <Ramona1> tmortagne:  http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/SCRIPTDOC-2 with the errors  
12:12 <tmortagne> [WARN] Restarting myxwiki.org  
12:15 <tmortagne> Ramona1: what you copy/pasted are warnings not errors and they are not very serious (not nice but not blockers)  
12:16 <tmortagne> don't you have some detail when you click on html macro error ?  
12:16 <tmortagne> i.e. what really crashed the execution  
12:23 <Ramona1> i am adding the details from html macro error in the ticket  
12:24 <tmortagne> thanks  
12:25 <Ramona1> i think there are the same

16:35 <Pbas> Hi, sorry about this, but activity stream is broken on myxwiki.org after the 7.3 upgrade?  
16:52 <tmortagne> Pbas: broken how ? it seems ok in my wiki  
16:52 <tmortagne> (I just created a new document, refreshed the home page and I can see it first)  
16:52 <tmortagne> (http://tuska.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome I don't remember if guest can view this wiki)  
16:53 <Pbas> activity streeam display no enties anymore  
16:53 <Pbas> http://coc.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/  
16:53 <Pbas> after the ugarde  
16:54 <tmortagne> well it indeed does not seems to display anything on http://coc.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ but it does on several other wikis so not sure what is wrong in your case  
16:54 <Pbas> Ok then I will search deeply thxs  
16:55 <tmortagne> checking something  
16:55 <Pbas> Something linked on PR maybe?  
16:56 <tmortagne> yep that's it  
16:57 <tmortagne> just resaved your activity page  
16:57 <Pbas> Ok thxs I muste be alone without PR ;-))  
16:57 <tmortagne> did not know this page required PR  
16:57 <tmortagne> it's not very nice  
16:57 <Pbas> Ok it is working now  
16:58 <Pbas> thxs. it is working in my sansdbox too
